mapper.select: SELECT a.user_id , a.is_paid_user , a.is_canceled , a.payment_day , a.due_date , date_add(str_to_date(concat(date_format(now(), '%Y%m') + 1, a.payment_day), '%Y%m%d'), interval +1 month) as end_date FROM user_attribute a WHERE a.user_id = #{param1}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_attribute (user_id, is_paid_user, is_canceled, payment_day, create_time) VALUES ( #{userId}, ${isPaidUser}, ${isCanceled}, date_format(now(), '%d'), now() )
